item.description: About us We are a Cloud Platform Engineering company. We advocate best practices underpinned by a ‘code first’ approach to building and operating cloud platforms. We have a wide range of expertise in all areas of cloud computing and automation and have delivered automated, secure, observable and cost-effective cloud platforms all over the world. We believe the best way to effect technology change is by delivering incremental value following agile methodologies, with short feedback loops and focus on continuous improvement.
